title: How to Fry a Mars Bar

steps.headline: Whisk the flour, salt, and water.
steps.description: Combine them together in a large bowl, beating them well with a whisk. Stir until the batter is made. Set aside.

steps.headline: Heat up the vegetable oil until it reaches 375° Fahrenheit (190° Celsius).
Dunk the Mars bars into the batter.
steps.description: Fully cover the chocolate bar until well-coated.

steps.headline: Fry the Mars bars for about 4-6 minutes.
steps.description: Cook until the Mars bars are golden brown.

steps.headline: Remove the Mars bars from the heat.
steps.description: Place them on a plate covered with a napkin to cool.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Slice the Mars bar into pieces, if desired. Garnish with a scoopful of ice cream or top with whipped cream. Enjoy!
